summary: South Korean agents Ryu and Lee are tracking a female assassin from North Korea who has mysteriously disappeared. With new killings and the theft of a deadly bomb, time is running out to catch her.
cast: Suk-kyu Han|Yunjin Kim|Choi Min-sik|Song Kang-Ho|Johnny Kim|Jung-min Hwang|Hyo-Seon Jang|Hyun-Sung Jang|Soo-Ro Kim|Seung-shin Lee|Yong-woo Park
keywords: man murders a woman|woman with a gun|murder of an innocent person|shooting a soldier|threat to murder
title: Shiri
